ABOUT.TITLE: Get to know me...
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Life motto
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Full-stack and mobile software developer with experience in creating robust and scalable applications. I work on backend, frontend, and Android and iOS applications, with a focus on architecture, quality, and product.

BULLETS.0: I design and develop modern, clear, and user experience-centered interfaces.
BULLETS.1: I build user-oriented web applications, optimizing usability, performance, and accessibility.
BULLETS.2: I translate business needs into functional and efficient visual solutions.
BULLETS.3: I improve and maintain existing interfaces to provide a better experience for users and clients.

BULLETS.0: I design and develop business logic and architecture that supports scalable applications.
BULLETS.1: I implement secure and maintainable solutions, prepared for long-term growth.
BULLETS.2: I optimize services and APIs to improve performance, stability, and efficiency.
BULLETS.3: I manage data storage and processing, ensuring integrity and availability.

BULLETS.0: Design and implement scalable architectures using Clean Architecture and BLoC/MVVM patterns for Flutter and Kotlin.
BULLETS.1: Monitor app stability and performance via Firebase Crashlytics to proactively resolve runtime issues and ANRs.
BULLETS.2: Orchestrate the end-to-end deployment process on Apple App Store and Google Play Store, ensuring compliance with platform guidelines.
BULLETS.3: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy covering Unit, Integration, and Usability tests to guarantee high-quality UI/UX.
BULLETS.4: Integrate Firebase cloud services to enhance real-time data synchronization and user engagement features.

BULLETS.0: Extract and process all kinds of data.
BULLETS.1: Analyze data with the right tools.
BULLETS.2: Create reports with the relevant insights.
BULLETS.3: Share results with leadership in a clear way.
